resources.string: You can use Ayurva Coins to avail discounts while booking services on the Ayurva App. which will then credited to your Ayurva Wallet on the completion of the service.The Amount of Ayurva Coins to be earned will be displayed during the checkout on the cart page.\n
Refer and eran and also you can purchase Ayurva coins\n

Go to Super Coin Redeem zone in Flipkart.Select above offer.
1). Redeem it with 150 Super coins.
2). You will get a Voucher.
3). Now, Download Ayurva app: bit.ly/2DcJLtF and sign up

NTHS shall refund any unexpended advance fees paid by You at the time of cancellation of the Service. In case You wish to seek a refund of the advance paid by You because You do not agree with a modification to the Agreement, please write to grievances@Ayurva.co. We will process refund of the unexpended amount

You can terminate Your relationship with NTHS at any time by providing ninety (90) days\' prior written notice at legal@Ayurva.co. We need this period to inactivate User account, only after verifying if there are any ongoing or pending Services.\n
Your prescription will be securely shared only with pharmacist necessary for the completion of this order
